alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 16 at 4:14PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 715 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 412 PM HST, radar indicated heavy showers and thunderstorms over over the north shore of Kauai, with the heaviest rain falling at a rate of 1 to 3 inches per hour between Anahola and Kalihiwai. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kapaa, Princeville, Kilauea, Hanalei, Moloaa, Wainiha, Wailua Homesteads, Haena, Wailua, Na Pali State Park, and Kealia. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 715 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
